content.detailedDescription: Well, i believe i saw my first unidentified object in the winnipeg sky (dare i say ufo??) & it was heading north, crossing portage avenue, between cavalier drive and david street. it was not simply a bright ball in the sky, but a larger plane-like craft (with what appeared to be short and wide wings) and the entire thing was so glowing red-orange like hot molten metal emitting flames, with no noise, and low enough that you knew it was unlikely any of the the following - commercial plane; helicopter; air balloon; flares; meteorite, and it  moved north-westward and appeared parallel to the ground (not ascending or descending). i was about 1.5 blocks away from my home, walking northward in a business parking lot, just off portage/bedson street at 7:42pm (cst). there was a nurse-aide who had just left her workplace and was heading to her parked vehicle - when she yell out loud to me twice ''what is that!'' she pointed above, and i looked upward, and just above to my right side was a large brilliantly illuminated plane-shaped craft that was like nothing i could simply imagine. it was moving north-west (winnipeg james a. richardson international airport, cfb winnipeg airport and st andrews airport are all north-east of my location and the craft). the two of us just stopped in the lot, looking up at the object/craft to watch in shock and awe, then wondering what the object was going to do next, as it appeared to hover for a few seconds, and then it slowly continued it's path. there was no plane exhaust and no appearance of any aviation navigation flashing lights to signify a plane or helicopter in flight. the craft appeared like it had solid and defined framing, yet the centre oblong shaped capsule actually looked unworldly translucent with glittering sparkles. the appearance i can describe - like the entire craft was an inferno of red-orange molten metal on the exterior along with fuzzy flames emitting the entire perimeter of its frame, with the capsule's translucent visual appearance both with many hundreds of white diamond glitter sparkles, and red flickering fire-embers. i cannot fully speak for the other woman, but i suspect she felt much like i did, realizing what we saw could not possibly be of this world. within 1.5 to 2 minutes after we saw the object, it had moved in its path approximately 2 or 3 city blocks away, when we last witnessed the object go beyond a couple of 3-level condo blocks, before it was out of sight. the nurse was going to drive several blocks north-westward to see if the craft would be in view again, also thinking the object may be close to a couple of schools approximately 5 to 6 city blocks away. as i continued my walk home, i saw approximately 6 elementary aged kids playing in my condo's courtyard along with a couple of concerned parents who had just stepped outdoors, as the children were so excited to witness what i saw. i decided not to approach them as i was not sure how much information to share as to what i observed - not wanting to put fear into the mothers, or their children. i did ask a friend you lives a bit north-west of me earlier today, and she was indoors before 7:30 pm last evening and did not see anything unusual. i also spoke to my uncle this evening about my experience, and he worked on boeing aircraft for 30+ years, and he considers the object to be very unlikely a commercial aircraft.
content.summary: Clear evening, large plane shaped

content.detailedDescription: I saw a bright light moveing back and forth side to side with a beam below it i saw three silver objecks doing sumer salts on top of each other it know when i am watching it because it moves cliser to my window sell i made one of my friends look at it to just to  make sure it was real he saw the same thing this event is going on every night
content.summary: Glowing light able to move back and forth  from side to side with a beam underneath it

content.detailedDescription: Objects recovered and hidden by individuals seen by hundreds, ex military has objects hidden and research ensued, paranormal type activity with changes made in genetic structure to offspring of personnel on project and personnel themselves with contact with entities. working on reverse technology, best understanding comes through native american staff members with communication possible with cherokee tribal member. will not expose intent of alien intelligence, but can assure it is weaponized and a deal has been struck with beings to advance the core group of individuals to survive the coming disaster and upheaval to come. any attempts to gain access will be met with deadly force, and entities seek access to funding for parts to rebuild and retrofit craft.
content.summary: Crash landing of three objects seen to several witnesses

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting outside and saw something round red/orange in the sky ..I had to run down my drive way to see it behind the trees. it was not a plane or anything else i have seen before. it was pulsating orb like object. i even called my kids outside to see  it.
content.summary: Orange/ red orb moving in the sky not very fast and no noise

content.detailedDescription: I never saw an object, as i was on my back porch, and i heard "something" coming through the air from the east, heading west. from the time i initially heard it to the time i couldnt hear it in the west anymore, was approximately a second, maybe a second and a half. there was no identifiable sound of a source of propulsion, no propellers, no engine, no jet or rocket that i could hear. the only sound was the sound of it cutting through the air.  by the time i heard it and attempted to move so that i could see what it was, it was gone. i see alot of air traffic where i live, including military jets and quite often they scream through here shaking the house and all, but i have never "seen" anything move this fast. probably just a coincidence, but immediately after it passed, all the outside activity seemed to stop.. no birds chirping, no neighbors yelling and beating on the whatever they beat on.  i will ask them tomorrow if they saw or heard anything. i was kinda freaked out by it, and normally it takes alot more than a noise to get my hackles raised, so to speak.
content.summary: Unseen aerial object travelling at incredible speed, from horizon to horizon without sound of  identifiable propulsion

content.detailedDescription: From my facebook post: alright, at least i know im not crazy, now my neighbors saw this: for 2 nights now, theres been a red "star" twinkling just over the trees (im in concord facing west) and this thing changes colors while staying still, then two little balls of light come out of it, and after about 20 minutes, the red star changes colors and then morphs into 5 or 6 really long oblong like "dashes" and its shines a bright light and then disappears, but then so do about 5 or 6 stars that are around the sky. like the whole bottom half of the horizon goes dark. tonight, there were two white stars that went into the red star. me n my neighbors were just watching this in our cul-de-sac. freaky!!!!!
content.summary: Red

content.detailedDescription: I was heading to the gas station, when coming down eaton hill, on the west side of hamilton ohio i glanced up and was awe-stricken by the sight of a red and white, brightly lit, ufo.   i know it not to be a plane because it was just hovering in place for about a minute or so.  i am not ignorant either.  judging from the distance away that i was, which in my opinion was less than two miles, the size must've been at least the size of the high school here in town.  which, while not miles long or anything, but a really big size.  the ship was steadily heading south, and abruptly stopped, and hovered for around ninety seconds.  after that i lost visual of the machine, and never regained vantage point.  it was a very exhilarating event to say the least.
content.summary: Saw what i truly believe to be a real ufo.  very bright white and red, kept getting brighter.

content.detailedDescription: I felt a disturbance in my side. i began to think about alien related topics, such as telepathic communication with beings, possible abductions/contact in the past, etc. against my control, i walked to a chair (one i usually don't sit in) in my living room and gazed out the back door. i noticed a bright glowing gold craft appear in the sky, shortly followed by another beside it. i ran outside to stare at them. they displayed movement and light in which i've never thought possible of any aircraft. i noticed they shut their lights off, and i turned around and noticed my parents inside my house. i went back inside to tell them the great news, but they dismissed it. my mom then left and my step-dad went to bed. i kept staring out the back door, and i saw them again. i ran to my room to grab the dislocated scope of a gun to get a better look at them. when i went back outside, they were glowing very bright, with bursts of light. i walked out into a field to get closer. as i gazed upon the crafts, i felt an inner joy, a great bliss, in which i've never felt before. i periodically lost control of my body, and it seemed as if i offered myself to the crafts. i don't have much memory from that, but the next thing i remember was me holding up the scope to get a glimpse of the second craft, it seemed to come closer to me. i viewed it with great detail, it looked like nothing i could even imagine. it also seemed to let out a white light, which seemed as if it was aimed in my direction. i then took the scope away and saw beings maybe 15 feet away from me. i became overwrought with fear, and i began to hyperventilate. i turned to run, but i didn't make it far. i found myself unable to control myself, and i turned around to stare at them more. it appeared as if one came towards me, and at that moment, i managed to turn and run away. i remained outside and called a close friend, emotionally breaking down. i still noticed the beings, but i looked away for a few seconds and they were gone, and i saw the crafts in the sky again. as i write this, i grow uncontrollably tired and i feel the disturbance in my side once more.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: Sighting of objects, uncontrolled actions, sighting of entities.

content.detailedDescription: Smoking a cigarette in yard.  thought i was looking at a star, till it started to move.  thought it was a plane but there were no visible flashing lights, could not have been a meteor because it never burnt out and the flightpath was too erratic.  was excited to see my first actual ufo sighting.  lost sight when it flew straight up and left 3 perfect rings of clouds.
content.summary: Starlike object seemed to follow dark clouds, flew higher than a plane and very fast.

content.detailedDescription:
The images were recorded on a game trail camera at our cabin near karthaus, pa.  the lights came from the south and the lights were not as bright at first, but brightened when they came in front of the trees and passed in front of the trees while there were deer in the field below them. we have four different photos of these lights. 
we have photos of the lights and also the sd card from the camera.  last year we also got and unusual "moon" light picture which people said was an orb from another game camera.  this "moon" orb  was also in front of the trees.
content.summary: Four square lights with a small space then four more square lights straight across

content.detailedDescription: I was on way to work, was around 6 05 in am, very foggy morning, im heading west on 275, when i past fairfield exit with kind of goes up hill then you start to go down hill and have a good view of land shape and horizon, i saw 3 bright red lights hovering in the sky , i watched it until i past the mount healthy exit, i really didn't think any thing of it, thought it was cell phone towers, but when i went to work this morn,, no lights of any kind in that area,, object was huge,,, seemed like it knew that it was a very foggy morning,, very wierd,, thank you,
content.summary: On way to work, very foggy morning, on 275 west, saw 3 red lights in a triangle

content.detailedDescription: I was in bed when i heard a helicopter fly very low over my house. i got up to watch this helicopter searching a area around my place and the shore front. the helicopter had its spot light and a red light on its tail, it could very well have been black because i could not see any color on it when it passed over me. the sky was clear and no obstacle to clear sight of the event. i had laid back down wishing this loud helicopter would leave so i could sleep. i was again out of my bed as i saw a very bright glowing orb hovering down toward the waterfront. it was there for several minutes and then began to descend. shortly after this orb was gone another one appeared and did the same thing as the first. the helicopter was in the area for everything that occurred.
content.summary: At 10 pm i heard a helicopter flying low and was in a search pattern over the area where i live. this continued for at least 45 min. after about 20 min. i saw a bright  orb/sphere hovering and slowly decend towards the nw of birchbay wa. it dissaperared

content.detailedDescription: Was outside laying on the ground stargazing at the draconoids meteor shower, in the time frame we witness meteor, planes and even satellites so we had a ray of comparisons for seeing this unknown object in the sky. it appeared directly above us out of nowhere very bright somewhere in the flying zones of planes. it moved very slowly and made its way going south and within a minute it changed direction 60 degrees and continue to travel in a not so straight line until eventually it faded away behind the very little clouds that were in the sky. being that there was also a satellite making its way across the sky as well as witnessing the meteors, it was easy to tell it was not like anything that could have some reason. eliminating all possible options left both us questioning what we saw and although we cannot just claim it was an alien or entity, it was definitely an unknown bright orb that appeared in the sky and traveled in a fashion unlike anything found in today's society. with no noise whatsoever and the sudden appearance, even being skeptical we accepted that what we witness was out of the norm.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Light appeared out of nowhere in the sky slowly making a path and changing direction

content.detailedDescription:
We were my wife and i visiting a local audubon sanctuary mid day sunny bluesky day.While sitting there in a meadow at approximately the same time we both observed what appeared to be a somewhat unusual looking aircraft.The unusual things about it were its shape ,like the way anormal aircraft would appear edge on from the side except for a pretty large domelike structure on top near center which appeared to be solid from bottom to top.Upon further observing with our birding binoculars we both observed some details on the dome itself resembling possibly a row of arched shaped windows from the base of the dome.Niether of us could see any wings but my wife said she saw a upright tail shape which i do not recall seeing.It moved with no sound in a straight horizontal direction going by us at a hight of about 30 to 40 degrees in the sky although hard to determine the distance . it appeared to me to be moving at jet speed on the slow end although my wife said she thought it  could be a glider.We watched it pass from approximately ne to se for no more than 4 or 5 min before fading from view in distance. my impressions upon fist sight were that i had never seen any aircraft or known of any aircraft with a dome such as that it felt bizzare and dare i say? alien to me. it has stayed in my mind since first seeing it and prompted me to call mufon yesterday and t
o write this official report today.

sincerely 

b m
content.summary: White plane like object viewed edge on or from side no wings seen, tail seen,no sound , solid dome structure on top of body possibly with archform windows

content.detailedDescription:
10/07/2013

i woke at approximately 4:30 a.M. to go outside to view the stars. as i was looking around i noticed a bright light moving across the sky. it looked similar to
a satellite but i was not sure what it was. then i saw another and another and more. below is a culmination of less then 1 hour of viewing the skies and the total
amount of these so-called satellites i viewed.

at 04:47 a.M. i had been looking through my 10 x 50 bushnell binoculars above me. i was facing south the entire time and noticed an object looking 
like a satellite come into view. it was moving from the northwest towards the southeast. it stayed relatively straight from that point on where i lost it about
45 degrees above the southeastern horizon. 

at 04:50 a.M. again looking straight up, i noticed a bright object moving from the north to the towards the south.
the object was lost at the southern horizon. 

at 04:52 a.M. i was looking around for more objects when another came into view moving from the north towards the south where i lost it just 
above the southern horizon.

at 05:05 a.M. i noticed another bright object that came into view moving from the north towards the south where i lost it just 
above the southern horizon again.

at 05:12 a.M. i noticed another bright object that came into view moving from the south towards the north where i lost it just 
above the northern horizon this time.

at 05:18 a.M. i noticed another bright object that came into view moving from the south towards the north where i lost it just 
above the northern horizon this time.

at 05:20 a.M. i noticed another bright object that came into view moving from the north towards the south this time where i lost it just 
above the southern horizon again.

at 05:30 a.M. i noticed another bright object that came into view this time moving from the west towards the east where i lost it above the eastern 
horizon.

so within 43 minutes, in the early morning hours of monday october 7th, 2013, there were 8 objects flying every which way crisscrossing the phoenix
skies. they all had the characterization of looking like satellites going across the skies. none of the objects were the same colors. some light blue, 
some yellow, some white in color. none seemed to be the same size either. some larger and some smaller. the speed was not consistent, 
each moving at it's own speed across the sky. some fast some slow. none though were as fast as a meteorite. no object changed directions either. 
what ever way they were pointing when i first observed them is the direction they kept going until i lost sight of them below the horizon. 
there were several high flying airplanes and a helicopter flying at the same time too.
content.summary: 8 objects zigzaged across the phoenix skies

content.detailedDescription: My daughter was on her way to work this morning in houston and saw this in the sky. she took the pic and sent it to me. it would seem like it was a plane--but given the fact that her  and i keep up on ufo news, she said she didn't think it was a plane and so i felt i should report it.
content.summary: Light in sky. my daughter said it was moving faster than what a plane could move

content.detailedDescription: This object has appeared on multiple nights, always between 7:15 pm and 8:30 pm, always in the wsw sky, and remains visible for approximately one hour. it does not deviate in altitude. it changes between two forms, seemingly as it slowly rotates. it is either a triple light or a single orb, always white, and changes in intensity. i have watched it through binoculars and when it disappears, it quickly dims and just "goes out". it does not set. it does not fly away. first the outer lights begin to dim, followed quickly by the center light until it is no longer visible. i have never seen it reappear the same night. there have been three adult witnesses to this and we all agree on the description. first, we believed it to be spica, then venus. but planets do not "dim away" nor do they have three distinct lights. we first observed this in september and filed a report at that time. i have contacted our local control tower as we are a few miles from an airport, but they could offer no explanation. after so many subsequent sightings i have decided to file an updated/new report for tonight's sighting. tonight's pictures are the best representation i have been able to capture, to date. all three witnesses are responsible, non-drinking adults who would really love to know what it is that keeps appearing in our sky!
content.summary: Recurring object in wsw sky, not venus

content.detailedDescription:
On oct. 8th. 2013 at approx . 8:15pm saw a bright object below the crescent moon. then observed several orbs brightly lit around the bright object.  drove towards milford on pontiac trail and stopped at a field in wixom, exited the vehicle and stood in a field and watched for approx. a half hour as what i would describe as the mother ship hovered in position while as many as ten different orbs would fly around  it.  
    there was a large amount of planes and helicopters around this area.  i watched as the mothership would descend in the flash of a second and then hover stationary.  many little orbs (they looked about the size and brightness of a satellite ) flew around the mothership (usually in pairs of two or three)   a second witness that was also looking at ufo stated that it appears two of the ships were firing at each other via a beam of light.  
    i looked to the north where ships were reported as shooting at each other.  i observed the orbs in question but did not observe any shooting of rays. i observed orbs get brighter then disappear in a flash. when i looked where the mothership was.... it was gone. 
    the incident lasted about forty minutes. it did appear as if the u.F.O's were engaging each other or engaging planes and helicopters in the vicinity.
    a poster from royal oak ( several cities east of my location) stated he watched what appeared to be a helicopter shoot down a ufo that fell from the sky. around same time frame. 
    drove west of my location from wixom to milford trying to observe more.  but to no avail.
when i returned home i observed a very low flying airplane  (just above tree line) never saw a plane flying that low.   the whole event was quite amazing.
content.summary: Mother ship hovering. many orbs flying around.

content.detailedDescription: I was standing out on my balcony at about 7 or 8 pm. it was getting cloudy.  my balcony faces redondo beach and i live about 2 miles from the ocean.  i saw a large object slowly flying south towards pv and then out to the ocean which is west.  so, i took out my phone camera and took two photos.  i blew them up so you could see how large the object was.  i thought it could be a blimp or plane.  but, it was too fast for a blimp and too slow for a plane  it was flashing alot of red, blue and yellow lights.  i got the pics of it while the clouds were going over it.
content.summary: Possible ufo over redondo beach trench?

content.detailedDescription: I was watching the sky shortly before 11pm tonight i was stunned when i noticed a fairly large v shaped object gliding about 500 feet above me at a very steady pace and its flight motion was very smooth. i could see 6 large domes that lined the bottom of the object 3 on each side. i immediately assumed these to be light's but was unable to tell as the object was not lit up... and had no sound. it drifted into the distance and disappeared. about 30 minutes later the object returned from the same path, same direction from the first sighting. it drifted off once more and disappeared.
content.summary: Large v shaped oject, no light, no sound

content.detailedDescription: I was driving southbound on utah state road 65 from the east canyon reservoir area (wasatch mountains) toward salt lake city/interstate 80 enjoying the autumn leaves on oct. 8th, 2013 approximately 430-5pm mst. relatively few cars were on the winding mountain road and the sky was very overcast. while driving on a fairly straight portion of the road, a glowing white light caught my eye. the spherical object was approximately the size of a cantaloupe or basketball and was hovering stationary near the top of a large tree. the object seemed to shimmer white light yet did not blink lights and did not change light color. it was a glowing ball of white transparent light. i quickly braked and grabbed my iphone (which was in camera mode as i had been stopping periodically to take pictures of the autumn leaves) and snapped a picture of the glowing orb. mere seconds later, the orb appeared on the opposite side of the 2-lane road at approximately the same height off the ground yet i did not witness the orb move from one location to the other. it was simply as if it "disappeared" as it moved between locations within seconds. i quickly snapped a second picture before the object simply was no longer visible. no longer seeing the object, i proceeding in driving toward my destination. once in slc, i stopped to look at the two pictures of the object i had taken. i was surprised to see that the object (which had appeared bright white to my eyes at the time i observed and photographed the object) appeared glowing green, not white, in the two photographs! the lighted object i witnessed and photographed was not a reflection from another vehicle or street sign, nor was it a malfunction of my iphone camera (inasmuch as i have taken literally hundreds of photos of this season's autumn leaves on the iphone at varying times of the day and early evening and have never seen a reflective green spherical object inadvertently appear in any of them). the green orbs shown in the attached photographs are what appeared to the naked eye as white glowing orbs. i do not know what it was i witnessed and photographed; i do however know i successfully captured whatever it was in two valid photos.
content.summary: Glowing white light approx size of basketball at treetops; took photo #1 them orb switched to other side of road within seconds for photo #2; appears green in photos although was white to the human eye

content.detailedDescription:
7:53 pm october 8th 2013. location coral springs fl. was outside looking northerly for draconids meteors. my nephew age 9 and i had been outside for 30 mins to let eyes adjust for darkness. we were looking northerly for meteors when we both saw a v shaped object move across the sky. the object was moving at about 2-3 times the velocity of the iss, of which we are accustomed to. it had about 8-10 white kinda fuzzy, yet definitely discernible lights in a v shaped arrangement. we observed it for a solid 5-9 seconds as it traveled nw to se. first spotted to the west of little dipper cup stars traveling nw to se. the object was approx. one half of my outstretched fist in width and length. our observations were: silent. no relative motion between lights during transit.  
seemed transparent between each light. each light remained same intensity during transit. it faded away as it traveled toward the se.
my nephew and i were amazed and in awe of what we witnessed. hopefully someone else saw what we saw.
content.summary: V shaped formation of lights. moved steadily.

content.detailedDescription: Came out to the porch, noticed what seemed to be a moving star. realized by movements and change in light it was not a star. could not have been a jet/plane or helicopter with the speed and directional change. it would change from bright white light to duller red. emitted way looked like red sparks. seemed to be encased in a black cloud but it is a crystal clear night. it moved in vertical circles but would also fall and rise very abruptly.  generally stayed within the same area. had a very strange feeling about the object that it was not man made. watched it for close to 2 hours with it ascending but not too terribly much.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: White/red light hovering in the sky, moving abruptly up, down, and in circles

content.detailedDescription: I observed an object falling at a high rate of speed in the vicinity of my home while driving from work. i stopped and took a picture. i arrived home within 4 minutes and could not locate the falling object. however, within minutes of arriving home, my daughter, and my mother and i observed an object no more than 500 ft above us,fly over my home. it was round in shape, and cast a very shiny light off of itself. it was flying south straight towards the sun. it appeared to have a spherical cloud around itself,but also something quite odd. it appeared to have a fin, much like a fish tail that created or propelled its movement forward. it seemed to glide effortlessly through the sky with no noise. i snapped pics of both. there should be a time stamp, as both were taken from my camera phone. the metor was quite large to see in person and these pics don't do it total justice.
content.summary: Meteor/drone???

content.detailedDescription: I dont guess you are very interested in my reports. i asked you to follow up since this is my third report. there must be someone in the austin area you could put me in touch with to check these things out. there is one in the north east sky right now flashing and moving up and down. it is so very obvious.To   say i am frustrated is putting it mildly. are you or are you not interested in ufo phenomenon? contact me and leave me a phone number and i will be happy to point these objects out to you. unless of coarse you know what they are and are bound by some kind of law to discredit sightings like these.Sincerely [name removed/cms/tg].
content.summary: Starlike,pulsating,like a lighthouse in the sky,moved up and down,various colors

content.detailedDescription: My husband and i left on a cruise ship from tampa,fl. to cozumel,mexico crossing the gulf of mexico, around october 20th of 2006, we had decided to go topside and get some fresh air and star gaze since we were in the middle of the ocean and it would be a perfect opportunity not to have any city lights or anything interfere. i can't recall the exact time but it was late midnight or so and i pointed out to my husband this tiny looking star, that after watching closely no bigger than a speck in the sky looked like it was moving so slow that the only way i could tell at first that it was moving was by using other stars around it as a reference. we watched it for about 7 minutes as we were trying to figure out what it was. it was way too high to be a plane we thought and couldn't see any other flashing lights around it as u would see on a plane. also, we thought it could be a satellite which i've seen many times as they go across a lot faster than what we were seeing and satellites seem to fade out as they go by but, just then outta no where all of our questions were answered in a split second when this very slow star like object shot off faster than the speed of light (just to give you an idea i don't know exactly how fast the speed of light travels but this looked like something off of star trek when they go into warp speed). it was definitely not from this world because nothing moves that slow to as fast as we seen that night. there was no tail like you would see on a shooting star and honestly it was way further up than that. we knew then it was some kind of ufo that we have only thought prior was malarkey until the day, or night in our case, comes along it happens to you and you see something you can never explain but know for a fact was there.
content.summary: What looked to be a tiny star really far away moving very very slowly, all of a sudden took off at the speed of light .

content.detailedDescription: Me and my husband have noticed at least 3 flying objects that make no sound and resemble a large star however they make sudden odd hover and circular patterns.  this has been going on for 2 weeks.  it appears to be 2 small crafts not too far away but also one that is much closer.  the one described above is what i believe to be the mother ship and i found with certainty it can appear to simply look like a yard light but suddenly shift and zig zag or rotate til its ducked behind the trees before coming back in view.  recently scared me so bad i hauled my behind inside my home were i felt safer somewhat.  once inside i viewed this object from my window.  the object became brighter and flashes of red lights began. scariest part was i suddenly noticed these dark slender beings that had unbelievable speeds and if i had of blinked i would not have seen them again.  this all began while trying to have a cigarette before bed but out of the corner of our eyes we could see movement and know something wasn't right.  at first i felt like the item was simply a yard light but quickly realized different.  my feelings are uncertain and i guess my biggest fear is how brave this object is and seeing creatures running across the field in front of my house was very frightening.  i just hope and pray my family and neighbors are safe.  several reports have been made in this exact area and i believe it is due to the open field, wooded areas around us plus the body of water, including a pond across the field in front of my home. the craziest part of all was hearing animals all over this quiet community, including dogs, horses, chickens, etc. completely frightened and very much concerned and alerting everyone of danger.  wish us luck and i'm hoping someone will come investigate cause this is the real deal.
content.summary: This siting appeared to be a dark orange yard light however none exist in that area.  it was below trees and either on the ground or just a few feet from it.  we were on the porch and it scared me so bad i came inside and watched from the window.

content.detailedDescription: This thing was in the sky at the same time, same area, heading in the same direction as reported from the first sighting report on 10-7-13. this sighting on 10-8-13 behaved in the same way, moving very slowly in the sky. this was not part of the meteorite shower. i took more video of it, but did not post because it was very similar to the footage from the first sighting (that i summited yesterday).
content.summary: Same sighting and time of sighting as reported on 10-7-13

content.detailedDescription:
My brother and i where in our backyard smoking and talking when i see a bright orange orb fairly low, it got brighter and dimmer then went out but you could still make out then went out of sight, we discussed how odd that was and was not like any plane or anything else i've seen before, then not a minute or so late i see a dark craft sort of gliding thought the air leaving a trail behind it. the craft was hard to make out even staring at right at it, the craft was extremely dark. we stood up and walked backwards keeping it insight for about 20 seconds then we lost sight of it. there was no noise, no lights on the craft. its seem sort of  "stealthy" to me. after that we sat back down then about 10 seconds later i spot out another orange orb it does the same as the first one growing brighter the dimming out to where you can only make out the actual shape of the orb. 
i am not sure what to believe
content.summary: Orange orbs and black craft

content.detailedDescription:
Ncis went off at 9 pm and i went out on the front porch at exactly 9:02 pm to sit with coffee. i noticed what appeared to be a low star alone in the sky at about 45 deg above the horizon to the north west. the object appeared to be about the size of an aspirin, hovering stationary next to the telegraph pole across the street and had a bright twinkling white light. i wanted a better look at the object that didn't move for ten minutes and got my field spotting scope. observed through the spotting scope and field glasses, the object appeared to move rapidly around a central point and change colors rapidly from white to red, green, and blue predominantly.
the object danced around a central point in small arcs that seemed to trace paths similar to the models of the atom you see in high school. i went inside to tell my daughter, her boyfriend, and my grandson to look out a front window and confirm my observation. the boyfriend and my grandson came down to the porch to observe outside, through the scope and binoculars and saw exactly the same patterns i described above. the time was 9:30 pm. the boyfriend observed a more faint object at the 10 o'clock position from the original doing exactly what the first object was doing. my eyesight was not good enough to see the second object. my grandson claimed to see something red shoot out of the bottom of the original object that we could not see with our naked eyes. we were amazed how much the object traced wild orbits around a center and constantly changed colors when observed through binoculars. this was very apparent because we were observing the object so close to the right edge of a telegraph pole. we gave up watching at 10 o'clock pm and went inside. for 1 full hour we watched two apparently stationary objects dance in wild orbits when observed through binoculars. the object appeared to be located over owego, new york from our geographical location.
content.summary: Viewed stationary next telegraph pole. flitting aroundcental axis through field glasses and displaying various colors.
